amendment.description: To restore funding for the Community Development Block Grant Program to the fiscal 2004 level by closing tax loopholes previously slated for elimination in Senate-passed legislation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3063 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 43.

action.text: Amendment SA 3063 proposed by Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S2111-2113, S2113; text: CR S2111-2112) To restore funding for the Community Development Block Grant Program to the fiscal 2004 level by closing tax loopholes previously slated for elimination in Senate-passed legislation.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3063 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 43.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3063 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 53. Record Vote Number: 43.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3063 proposed by Senator Murray.
